pma:database.name: universidad
pma:database.pma:table: CREATE TABLE `administradores` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `id_usuarios` int(11) NOT NULL, `funciones` text NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `id_usuarios` (`id_usuarios`), CONSTRAINT `administradores_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`id_usuarios`) REFERENCES `usuarios` (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=2 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci;

CREATE TABLE `alumnos` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `id_usuarios` int(11) NOT NULL, `np` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `nombre_alumno` varchar(30) NOT NULL, `apellidos` varchar(30) NOT NULL, `correo_alumno` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE KEY `np` (`np`), KEY `id_usuarios` (`id_usuarios`), KEY `np_2` (`np`), CONSTRAINT `alumnos_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`id_usuarios`) REFERENCES `usuarios` (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=3 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci;

CREATE TABLE `canalizaciones` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `id_material_cableado` int(11) NOT NULL, `m2` double NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `id_material_cableado` (`id_material_cableado`), CONSTRAINT `canalizaciones_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`id_material_cableado`) REFERENCES `material_cableado` (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=2 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci;

CREATE TABLE `equipos` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `id_planta` int(11) NOT NULL, `id_redes` int(11) NOT NULL, `tipo` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `ubicacion` varchar(30) NOT NULL, `modelo` varchar(30) NOT NULL, `so` text NOT NULL, `marca` text NOT NULL, `reserva` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `id_planta` (`id_planta`), KEY `id_redes` (`id_redes`), CONSTRAINT `equipos_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`id_planta`) REFERENCES `plantas` (`id`), CONSTRAINT `equipos_ibfk_2` FOREIGN KEY (`id_redes`) REFERENCES `redes` (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=5 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci;

CREATE TABLE `impresora` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `id_equipo` int(11) NOT NULL, `tinta` varchar(10) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `id_equipo` (`id_equipo`), CONSTRAINT `impresora_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`id_equipo`) REFERENCES `equipos` (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=2 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci;

CREATE TABLE `pc` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `id_equipo` int(11) NOT NULL, `raton` varchar(30) NOT NULL, `teclado` varchar(30) NOT NULL, `tamaño` double NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `id_equipo` (`id_equipo`), CONSTRAINT `pc_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`id_equipo`) REFERENCES `equipos` (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=2 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci;

CREATE TABLE `plantas` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `id_edificio` int(11) NOT NULL, `nº_planta` int(11) NOT NULL, `nº_aula` int(11) NOT NULL, `tamaño` double NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `id_edificio` (`id_edificio`), CONSTRAINT `plantas_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`id_edificio`) REFERENCES `edificios` (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=5 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci;

CREATE TABLE `plantas_material_cableado` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `id_planta` int(11) NOT NULL, `id_material_cableado` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `id_planta` (`id_planta`,`id_material_cableado`), KEY `id_material_cableado` (`id_material_cableado`), CONSTRAINT `plantas_material_cableado_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`id_material_cableado`) REFERENCES `material_cableado` (`id`), CONSTRAINT `plantas_material_cableado_ibfk_2` FOREIGN KEY (`id_planta`) REFERENCES `plantas` (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=2 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci;

CREATE TABLE `profesores` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `id_usuarios` int(11) NOT NULL, `nº_alumno` int(11) NOT NULL, `asignaturas` varchar(30) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `id_usuarios` (`id_usuarios`), CONSTRAINT `profesores_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`id_usuarios`) REFERENCES `usuarios` (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=5 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci;

CREATE TABLE `racks` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `id_material_cableado` int(11) NOT NULL, `tamaño_rack` double NOT NULL, `modelo` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `marca` text NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `id_material_cableado` (`id_material_cableado`), CONSTRAINT `racks_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`id_material_cableado`) REFERENCES `material_cableado` (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=2 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci;

CREATE TABLE `redes_usuarios` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `id_redes` int(11) NOT NULL, `id_usuarios` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `id_redes` (`id_redes`,`id_usuarios`), KEY `id_usuarios` (`id_usuarios`), CONSTRAINT `redes_usuarios_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`id_redes`) REFERENCES `redes` (`id`), CONSTRAINT `redes_usuarios_ibfk_2` FOREIGN KEY (`id_usuarios`) REFERENCES `usuarios` (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=4 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci;
pma:database.pma:view: CREATE ALGORITHM=UNDEFINED DEFINER=`root`@`localhost` SQL SECURITY DEFINER VIEW `universidad`.`red_usuario` AS select `r`.`id` AS `id`,`r`.`nombre_red` AS `nombre_red`,count(`u`.`nº_usuario`) AS `nº_usuarios` from ((`universidad`.`redes` `r` join `universidad`.`redes_usuarios` `ru` on(`r`.`id` = `ru`.`id_redes`)) join `universidad`.`usuarios` `u` on(`u`.`id` = `ru`.`id_usuarios`)) group by `r`.`id`;

CREATE ALGORITHM=UNDEFINED DEFINER=`root`@`localhost` SQL SECURITY DEFINER VIEW `universidad`.`red_usuarios` AS select `r`.`id` AS `id`,`r`.`nombre_red` AS `nombre_red`,count(`u`.`nº_usuario`) AS `nº_usuarios`,count(`al`.`id`) AS `total_añumnos`,count(`ad`.`id`) AS `total_admin`,count(`p`.`id`) AS `total_profesores` from (((((`universidad`.`redes` `r` join `universidad`.`redes_usuarios` `ru` on(`r`.`id` = `ru`.`id_redes`)) join `universidad`.`usuarios` `u` on(`u`.`id` = `ru`.`id_usuarios`)) left join `universidad`.`alumnos` `al` on(`u`.`id` = `al`.`id_usuarios`)) left join `universidad`.`administradores` `ad` on(`u`.`id` = `ad`.`id_usuarios`)) left join `universidad`.`profesores` `p` on(`u`.`id` = `p`.`id_usuarios`)) group by `r`.`id`;
pma:database.pma:table: CREATE TABLE `roseta` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL, `id_material_cableado` int(11) NOT NULL, `tipo_roseta` text NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `id_material_cableado` (`id_material_cableado`), CONSTRAINT `roseta_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`id_material_cableado`) REFERENCES `material_cableado` (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci;

CREATE TABLE `servidor` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `id_equipo` int(11) NOT NULL, `funciones` text NOT NULL, `tipo_servidor` text NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `id_equipo` (`id_equipo`), CONSTRAINT `servidor_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`id_equipo`) REFERENCES `equipos` (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=3 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci;

CREATE TABLE `tomas` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `id_material_cableado` int(11) NOT NULL, `tipo_toma` text NOT NULL, `nombre_toma` varchar(30) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `id_material_cableado` (`id_material_cableado`), CONSTRAINT `tomas_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`id_material_cableado`) REFERENCES `material_cableado` (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=2 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci;

CREATE TABLE `usuarios` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `nº_usuario` varchar(30) NOT NULL, `nombre_usuario` text NOT NULL, `rol` text NOT NULL, `correo` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=4 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci;
